```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(janitor)
library(readxl)

practice_sheet <- read_excel(here('data',"DataCenterEnergyUse_vR_Working.xlsx"), sheet = "Apple")
```

```{r}

#filter by company name and year
practice_filtered <- practice %>% 
  filter(company == "Apple" & year == "2019")

#filter by only subset totals
practice_total <- practice_filtered %>% 
  filter(data_level == "Subset Total") 

#filter by only subset of subsets
practice_subset <- practice_filtered %>% 
  filter(data_level == "Subset of Subset") 
  
#sum subset totals
subset_total <- sum(as.numeric(practice_total$value))

#sum subset of subset totals and grab names
subset_of_subset_total <- sum(as.numeric(practice_subset$value))

subset_of_subset_names <- unique(practice_subset$fuel)

```
